item.title: Jalapeno Cheddar Sourdough
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
One of our Best Selling Loaf. A Country Sourdough with inclusions of Pickled Sliced Jalapenos and Shredded Mixed Cheddar.

The post Jalapeno Cheddar Sourdough appeared first on Junebug.
item.content:encoded:
One of our Best Selling Loaf. A Country Sourdough with inclusions of Pickled Sliced Jalapenos and Shredded Mixed Cheddar.

item.title: Valrhona Cocoa Sourdough
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Our luxurious Best Selling Chocolate Loaf. Cocoa Country Sourdough mixed with Valrhona Cocoa Powder with inclusions of mixed Callebaut Chocolate Callets (Milk, Dark and Caramel Callets).

The post Valrhona Cocoa Sourdough appeared first on Junebug.
item.content:encoded:
Our luxurious Best Selling Chocolate Loaf. Cocoa Country Sourdough mixed with Valrhona Cocoa Powder with inclusions of mixed Callebaut Chocolate Callets (Milk, Dark and Caramel Callets).

The post Valrhona Cocoa Sourdough appeared first on Junebug.

item.title: Brown Bread Baguettes

item.description:

item.title: 1kg Country Sourdough
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
A generous family sized Country Sourdough. Presliced and yields about 12-14 slices approximately. Ingredients consist of Flour, Salt, Sourdough Starter, Water.

The post 1kg Country Sourdough appeared first on Junebug.
item.content:encoded:
A generous family sized Country Sourdough. Presliced and yields about 12-14 slices approximately.

Ingredients consist of Flour, Salt, Sourdough Starter, Water.

The post 1kg Country Sourdough appeared first on Junebug.

item.title: Country Sourdough
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
A traditional plain Wholewheat Country Sourdough. Ingredients consist of High Protein Bread Flour, Wholewheat Flour, Rye Starter, Sea Salt & Water.  

The post Country Sourdough appeared first on Junebug.
item.content:encoded:
A traditional plain Wholewheat Country Sourdough.

Ingredients consist of High Protein Bread Flour, Wholewheat Flour, Rye Starter, Sea Salt & Water.

 

The post Country Sourdough appeared first on Junebug.

item.title: Wholewheat Rye Sourdough
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Plain Country Sourdough with Rye Grain Flour. Ingredients consist of High Protein Bread Flour, Wholewheat Flour, Rye Flour, Malt Enzymes, Starter, Sea Salt & Water.

The post Wholewheat Rye Sourdough appeared first on Junebug.
item.content:encoded:
Plain Country Sourdough with Rye Grain Flour.

Ingredients consist of High Protein Bread Flour, Wholewheat Flour, Rye Flour, Malt Enzymes, Starter, Sea Salt & Water.

The post Wholewheat Rye Sourdough appeared first on Junebug.
